headline: Rockwell Automation and AWS Collaborate to Transform Manufacturing Through Advanced Industrial Automation Solutions at Hannover Messe 2025
summary: DUSSELDORF, Germany, April 02, 2025--Rockwell Automation (NYSE: ROK), the world’s largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, and Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS), today announced they are working together to help streamline and accelerate the digital transformation of the manufacturing industry. By combining Rockwell’s operational technology (OT) with AWS's advanced cloud services and global infrastructure, manufacturers will be equipped with scalable, secure,
